data.oai_dc:dc: Phased RNA Polymerase II Transcription Factor Alignment

Phased RNA Polymerase II Transcription Factor alignment used in the final *BEAST species tree inference. Heterozygous haplotypes were reconstructed using the program PHASE v2.1 (Stephens et al., 2001).This gene region is orthologous to Ixodes protein ISCW004924.
